title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 325.19 - Standards for commercial pesticide applicator certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 325.19 - Standards for commercial pesticide applicator certification

State Regulations
(a) Individuals seeking commercial pesticide
applicator certification must demonstrate competency in the categories and
subcategories of commercial pesticide applicator certification, according to
standards prescribed by the department. Competence in the use and handling of
pesticides shall be determined on the basis of written examinations prepared by
the department, and, as appropriate, performance testing, based upon standards
set by the department. Such examination and testing shall include general
standards applicable to all categories and additional standards specifically
identified for each category or subcategory in which an applicator is to be
classified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
325.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
